metadata.name: Potential Privilege Escalation To LOCAL SYSTEM
metadata.comment: Detects unknown program using commandline flags usually used by tools such as PsExec and PAExec to start programs with SYSTEM Privileges

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -s cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /s cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –s cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —s cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―s cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -s -i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -s /i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -s –i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -s —i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -s ―i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /s -i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /s /i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /s –i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /s —i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /s ―i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –s -i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –s /i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –s –i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –s —i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –s ―i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —s -i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —s /i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —s –i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —s —i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —s ―i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―s -i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―s /i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―s –i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―s —i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―s ―i cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i -s cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i /s cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i –s cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -i —s cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―i —s powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―i ―s powershell'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('paexec')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('psexec')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('accepteula'))))

output.summary: Detects unknown program using commandline flags usually used by tools such as PsExec and PAExec to start programs with SYSTEM Privileges

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Weird admins that rename their tools 2. Software companies that bundle PsExec/PAExec with their software and rename it, so that it is less embarrassing References: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/downloads/psexec, https://www.poweradmin.com/paexec/, https://www.fireeye.com/blog/threat-research/2020/10/kegtap-and-singlemalt-with-a-ransomware-chaser.html
